00001 // ORGretaDecoder.hh
00002 
00003 #ifndef _ORGretaMarkIVDecoder_hh_
00004 #define _ORGretaMarkIVDecoder_hh_
00005 
00006 #include "ORGretaDecoder.hh"
00007 /* This card is very similar to the original Greta card, but has some important
00008    differences.  For example, it is possible that a record has a Master record
00009    accompanying it and so this is important to check when reading data from a 
00010    record.  Also, the raw data points (i.e. waveform data) are given in sign
00011    extended format, meaning that the points will occupy the entire 16-bit word.
00012    Currently, the decoder assumes that these are just unsigned numbers and so
00013    a cast should be done while processing to correctly decode these numbers.  
00014    The reason this is not done in the decoder is to remain consistent with the
00015    old card.  This can be re-evaluated in the future.  
00016 
00017    The old interface was changed to allow CFD Point One/Two to occupy 32 bits.
00018 
00019    New Greta card additions:
00020    - Master header (optional, must check for existence using HasMasterHeader())
00021      - Trigger_TS
00022      - HM Number
00023      - Low Resolution Energy
00024    - Slave header
00025      - FB_LED
00026      - HM Number
00027    - IsTTCLTimeout() -> signifies data generated by a timeout signal during TTCL mode.
00028    - CFD point 1/2 -> now occupies full 32 bits.
00029 
00030 
00031     It is also important to note that currently the record does not support 
00032     running in TTCL (Trigger Timing and Control Link) mode which occurs when
00033     a card is master over other cards (slaves).  
00034    */
00035    
00036 
00037 class ORGretaMarkIVDecoder: public ORGretaDecoder
00038 {
00039   public:
00040     ORGretaMarkIVDecoder();
00041     virtual ~ORGretaMarkIVDecoder() {}
00042     enum EGretaMarkIVConsts {kORCAHeadLen    = 2,
00043                              kMasterHeadLen  = 4, 
00044                              kSlaveHeaderLen = 4, 
00045                              kMarkIVBufHeadLen     = 7};
00046     
00047     virtual std::string GetDataObjectPath() { return "ORGretina4Model:Gretina4"; }  
00048     virtual std::string GetDictionaryObjectPath() { return "ORGretina4Model"; }  
00049     
00050     virtual bool SetDataRecord(UInt_t* record);
00051        
00052     virtual inline UShort_t GetEnergyNormalization();
00053     virtual inline UInt_t GetEnergy();
00054     virtual inline UShort_t GetEnergyHi();
00055     virtual inline UShort_t GetChannelNum();
00056     // Functions that return data from Master Header
00057     virtual inline Bool_t HasMasterHeader() {return fHasMasterHeader;}
00058     virtual inline UShort_t GetMasterBoardID();
00059     virtual inline UShort_t GetMasterHeaderLength();
00060     virtual inline UShort_t GetMasterTrigger_TSLow();
00061     virtual inline UShort_t GetMasterTrigger_TSMed();
00062     virtual inline UShort_t GetMasterTrigger_TSHigh();
00063     virtual inline ULong64_t GetMasterTrigger_TS();
00064     virtual inline UShort_t GetMasterHMNum();
00065     virtual inline UShort_t GetMasterLowResEnergy();
00066 
00067     // Functions that return data from Slave Header
00068     virtual inline Bool_t HasSlaverHeader() {return fHasSlaverHeader;}
00069     virtual inline UShort_t GetSlaveBoardID();
00070     virtual inline UShort_t GetSlaveHeaderLength();
00071     virtual inline UShort_t GetSlaveFB_LEDLow();
00072     virtual inline UShort_t GetSlaveFB_LEDMed();
00073     virtual inline UShort_t GetSlaveFB_LEDHigh();
00074     virtual inline ULong64_t GetSlaveFB_LED();
00075     virtual inline UShort_t GetSlaveHMNum();
00076 
00077     //Functions that return data from buffer header:
00078     virtual inline size_t GetBufHeadLen() {return (size_t) kMarkIVBufHeadLen;}
00079     virtual inline Bool_t IsTTCLTimeout();
00080     virtual inline UInt_t GetCFDPointOne();
00081     virtual inline UInt_t GetCFDPointTwo();
00082 
00083     /* Functions satisfying the ORVDigitizerDecoder interface. */
00084     virtual inline UShort_t GetBitResolution() { return 14; }
00085     virtual UInt_t GetEventWaveformPoint( size_t /*event*/, 
00086                                           size_t waveformPoint );
00087       /* All other functions are correctly inherited from the parent class. */
00088 
00089    
00090   protected:
00091     virtual inline size_t GetRecordOffset() {return kORCAHeadLen + fOffset;}
00092     /* GetRecordOffset() returns how many words the record is offset from the 
00093        beginning.  This is useful when additional headers are added. */
00094     bool fHasMasterHeader;
00095     bool fHasSlaverHeader;
00096     size_t fOffset;
00097 };
00098 
00099 inline UShort_t ORGretaMarkIVDecoder::GetEnergyNormalization()
00100 {
00101   return (UShort_t) GetIntegrationTime(); 
00102 }
00103 
00104 inline UInt_t ORGretaMarkIVDecoder::GetEnergy()
00105 {
00106   UInt_t energy = ORGretaDecoder::GetEnergy();
00107   if (energy & 0x1000000) energy = (~energy & 0x1ffffff) + 1;
00108   return energy;
00109 }
00110 
00111 inline UShort_t ORGretaMarkIVDecoder::GetEnergyHi()
00112 {
00113   return (UShort_t) (fDataRecord[GetRecordOffset()+3] & 0x1ff); 
00114 }
00115 
00116 inline UShort_t ORGretaMarkIVDecoder::GetChannelNum()
00117 {
00118   return (UShort_t) (fDataRecord[GetRecordOffset()] & 0xF);
00119 }
00120 
00121 
00122 inline UShort_t ORGretaMarkIVDecoder::GetMasterBoardID() 
00123 {
00124   return (UShort_t) (fDataRecord[kORCAHeadLen] & 0xffff);   
00125 }
00126 
00127 inline UShort_t ORGretaMarkIVDecoder::GetMasterHeaderLength() 
00128 {
00129   return (UShort_t) ((fDataRecord[kORCAHeadLen] & 0x7FF0000) >> 16);   
00130 }
00131 
00132 inline UShort_t ORGretaMarkIVDecoder::GetMasterTrigger_TSLow() 
00133 {
00134   return (UShort_t) (fDataRecord[kORCAHeadLen + 1] & 0xffff);   
00135 }
00136 
00137 inline UShort_t ORGretaMarkIVDecoder::GetMasterTrigger_TSMed() 
00138 {
00139   return (UShort_t) (fDataRecord[kORCAHeadLen + 1] >> 16);   
00140 }
00141 
00142 inline UShort_t ORGretaMarkIVDecoder::GetMasterTrigger_TSHigh() 
00143 {
00144   return (UShort_t) (fDataRecord[kORCAHeadLen + 2] & 0xffff);   
00145 }
00146 
00147 inline ULong64_t ORGretaMarkIVDecoder::GetMasterTrigger_TS() 
00148 {
00149   return BitConcat(GetMasterTrigger_TSLow(), GetMasterTrigger_TSMed(),
00150            GetMasterTrigger_TSHigh());;   
00151 }
00152 
00153 inline UShort_t ORGretaMarkIVDecoder::GetMasterHMNum() 
00154 {
00155   return (UShort_t) (fDataRecord[kORCAHeadLen + 2] >> 16);   
00156 }
00157 
00158 inline UShort_t ORGretaMarkIVDecoder::GetMasterLowResEnergy() 
00159 {
00160   return (UShort_t) (fDataRecord[kORCAHeadLen + 3] & 0xffff);   
00161 }
00162 
00163 inline UShort_t ORGretaMarkIVDecoder::GetSlaveBoardID() 
00164 {
00165   return (UShort_t) (fDataRecord[kORCAHeadLen+kMasterHeadLen] & 0xffff);   
00166 }
00167 
00168 inline UShort_t ORGretaMarkIVDecoder::GetSlaveHeaderLength() 
00169 {
00170   return (UShort_t) (fDataRecord[kORCAHeadLen+kMasterHeadLen] >> 16);   
00171 }
00172 
00173 inline UShort_t ORGretaMarkIVDecoder::GetSlaveFB_LEDLow() 
00174 {
00175   return (UShort_t) (fDataRecord[kORCAHeadLen+kMasterHeadLen + 1] & 0xffff);   
00176 }
00177 
00178 inline UShort_t ORGretaMarkIVDecoder::GetSlaveFB_LEDMed() 
00179 {
00180   return (UShort_t) (fDataRecord[kORCAHeadLen+kMasterHeadLen + 1] >> 16);   
00181 }
00182 
00183 inline UShort_t ORGretaMarkIVDecoder::GetSlaveFB_LEDHigh() 
00184 {
00185   return (UShort_t) (fDataRecord[kORCAHeadLen+kMasterHeadLen + 2] & 0xffff);   
00186 }
00187 
00188 inline ULong64_t ORGretaMarkIVDecoder::GetSlaveFB_LED() 
00189 {
00190   return BitConcat(GetSlaveFB_LEDLow(), GetSlaveFB_LEDMed(),
00191            GetSlaveFB_LEDHigh());;   
00192 }
00193 
00194 inline UShort_t ORGretaMarkIVDecoder::GetSlaveHMNum() 
00195 {
00196   return (UShort_t) (fDataRecord[kORCAHeadLen+kMasterHeadLen + 2] >> 16);   
00197 }
00198 
00199 inline Bool_t ORGretaMarkIVDecoder::IsTTCLTimeout() 
00200 {
00201   return (Bool_t) (fDataRecord[GetRecordOffset()+3] >> 11);   
00202 }
00203 
00204 inline UInt_t ORGretaMarkIVDecoder::GetCFDPointOne() 
00205 {
00206   return (fDataRecord[GetRecordOffset()+5]);   
00207 }
00208 
00209 inline UInt_t ORGretaMarkIVDecoder::GetCFDPointTwo() 
00210 {
00211   return (fDataRecord[GetRecordOffset()+6]);   
00212 }
